alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones County through 345 PM CDT... At 300 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ellisville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ellisville around 330 PM CDT. Laurel around 340 PM CDT. Tuckers Crossing around 345 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Mississippi.
